title: Spicy Three-bean Salad
ingredients: ['125g green beans, halved', '2 tbsp olive oil', '2 tbsp white wine vinegar', '1 tsp mild curry powder or smoked paprika', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '400g can cannellini or red kidney beans, drained and rinsed', '400g flageolet or black-eyed beans, drained and rinsed', '6 spring onions, chopped', '150g firm mozzarella, cut into cubes or sticks', '2 large or 4 medium vine-ripened tomatoes, thinly sliced', '4 tbsp roughly chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley or coriander']
